statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicVariationData;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number, effect_on_protein FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE mutation_type='Deletion';
SELECT variation_id, position_on_chromosome, disease_association FROM GenomicVariationData ORDER BY variation_id DESC;
SELECT chromosome_number, COUNT(*) AS mutation_count FROM GenomicVariationData GROUP BY chromosome_number;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE disease_association LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY position_on_chromosome ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, disease_association FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE chromosome_number = 2 ORDER BY mutation_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE disease_association like '%Cancer%' AND position_on_chromosome > 10000;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_number FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE mutation_type = 'Missense';
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, effect_on_protein FROM GenomicVariationData WHERE position_on_chromosome BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY position_on_chromosome ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variation;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM genetic_variation WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, variation_type FROM genetic_variation ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, impact_score FROM genetic_variation WHERE variation_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM genetic_variation WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM genetic_variation ORDER BY gene_name DESC, variation_id ASC
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM genetic_variation WHERE impact_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM disease_association WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer'

SELECT gene_name, COUNT(association_id) AS assoc_count FROM genetic_variation JOIN disease_association ON genetic_variation.variation_id = disease_association.variation_id GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(association_id) > 2
SELECT DISTINCT disease_name FROM disease_association
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT disease_name, category FROM diseases WHERE category = 'Genetic Disorder';
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE position > 1000 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT disease_name, effect, severity FROM diseases JOIN mutation_implications ON diseases.disease_id = mutation_implications.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations JOIN mutation_implications ON mutations.mutation_id = mutation_implications.mutation_id WHERE disease_id = '12345';
SELECT disease_name, category, COUNT(*) AS mutation_count FROM diseases JOIN mutation_implications ON diseases.disease_id = mutation_implications.disease_id GROUP BY disease_name, category;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name IN ('BRCA1', 'TP53') AND chromosome = 'Y' ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE category LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Variations;
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, impact_score FROM Variations WHERE impact_score > 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT disease_name, gene_involved, risk_factor FROM Diseases ORDER BY risk_factor DESC;
SELECT sample_name, collection_date, genotype FROM Samples WHERE genotype LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM Variations WHERE impact_score > 0.7;
SELECT variation_id, gene_name, variation_type FROM Variations WHERE variation_type = 'SNP' ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT disease_name, gene_involved, clinical_manifestation FROM Diseases WHERE risk_factor < 0.5 AND clinical_manifestation LIKE '%fever%';
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob, ethnicity FROM Patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, patient_id, collection_date FROM Samples WHERE genotype LIKE '%AA%' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male');
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE gene_name='BRCA1';
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM diseases ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM studies WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM diseases WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_type FROM variants WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position > 1000 ORDER BY variant_name ASC;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, publication_date FROM studies WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
